location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Reise nach Südarabien und Geographische Forschungen im und über den südwestlichsten Theil Arabiens ... Mit einer Karte.'

physicalDescription.extent: The volume contains a table of contents with chapter headings with page references (pp ix-xvi). Each chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of that chapter. There is also an alphabetic index at the back of the volume (pp 409-422) with page references.

mods.abstract: Reise nach Südarabien und Geographische Forschungen im und über den südwestlichsten Theil Arabiens, by Baron Heinrich Freiherrn von Maltzan.Publication details: Braunschweig, 1873.Physical description: Octavo; includes map.
